entries.content: The tenor sax solo at the start of "Hot Feet" is the only Carney recording on that instrument. For New DESOR, also take -1 of "The Dicty Glide" was issued on Vi V-38053 and also take -1 of "Sloppy Joe" was issued on Vi V-38065; according to Steven Lasker, there isn't any known evidence of that.

entries.content: Same Train is by Choir only. Although several reference works identify the choir as the Hall Johnson Choir, Steven Lasker has found no credible evidence that the Hall Johnson Choir worked on Black and Tan.
